Flame Servant Aslan:
Let me tell you how to hatch a Small Draco Egg.
Remember, you can hatch a Small Draco Egg by yourself.
Summon the Small Draco Egg in your inventory. It will appear with a base temperature of 16 degrees.
The Flame Spirit Agathion can use Pa'agrio's Hand on the Small Draco Egg to raise its temperature. But this is not always easy! Even the Flame Spirit struggles to wield Pa'agrio's Hand. The temperature increase may be anywhere between 1 - 10 degrees.
The egg should hatch between 26 - 36 degrees. It will definitely hatch if the temperature hits exactly 37 degrees. After that point, though, it will break!
Draco researchers say the closer the temperature is to 37 degrees, the more likely it is to hatch.
Oh! One last thing. When you're in a party, your Draco Egg will be summoned at the same time as your other party members' eggs!
